data.title: 225 Live Events
meta_keywords:
Open Mic & Nightlife in the 225 Red Stick area. 
    It’s all here
data.meta_description:
A calendar of Live Music, Comedy, Arts/Theatre, Karaoke, Family Events, Open Mic & Nightlife in the 225 Red Stick area. 
    It’s all here, look for yourself. Includes Albany, Baker, Baton Rouge, Brusly, Clinton, Convent, Denham Springs, Donaldsonville, Gonzales,
    Greensburg, Jackson, Livingston, Lutcher, Maurepas, New Roads, Plaquemine, St. Francisville, St. Gabriel, Springfield, Walker, Wilson, 
    Zachary.
data.text: 1560574800 Live Music Hip Deep Raising Canes River Center June 15, 2019 June 15, 2019 2:00 PM 3:00 PM BR Pride Presents HIP Deep 1560574800 Family Events Sweet and Hopeless at BR Pride Raising Canes River Center June 15, 2019 June 15, 2019 11:00 AM 7:00 PM Join Sweet and Hopeless this year at Baton Rouge Pride June 15th from 11-7 at the The Queerative Market: A Southern Queer Arts Market upstairs in the Canes center! We've got Pride Surprises galore, and our usual creepiness as well. Come by, get cool, and get your festival on 1560574800 Live Music Pepper Mashay Raising Canes River Center June 15, 2019 June 15, 2019 5:30 PM 6:00 PM Pepper Mashay - Sponsored by The Lucky Law Firm 1560574800 Live Music Frenchie Davis Raising Canes River Center June 15, 2019 June 15, 2019 6:15 PM 6:45 PM Frenchie Davis Performs Live 1560574800 Family Events GymFit’s Mobile Adventures Raising Canes River Center June 15, 2019 June 15, 2019 12:00 PM 6:30 PM Celebrate Pride Week at Pride Fest this Saturday, June 15th from 12-7pm at the River Center! GymFit will be suppling our Mobile Adventure set up for kids of all ages to enjoy! You can expect to see our mini Ninja Warrior/Parkoue course, Interactive Circus Arts (AcroYoga, Aerial silks, hoops) and much more! They will have many other activities for everyone to enjoy! Check out their website https://www.batonrougepride.org/2019.html for more info 1560574800 Live Music Southern Soul and R&B Extravaganza Raising Canes River Center June 15, 2019 June 15, 2019 7:00 PM 11:00 PM 2ND ANNUAL SOUTHERN SOUL AND R&B EXTRAVAGANZA FEATURING SIR CHARLES JONES, LYFE JENNINGS, CALVIN RICHARDSON, SHIRLEY MURDOCH AND GLENN JONES. 1561870800 Live Music Outlaws & Renegades Featuring Travis Tritt and The Charlie Daniels Band Raising Canes River Center June 30, 2019 June 30, 2019 7:00 PM 10:00 PM Sale Dates and Times: Public Onsale : Fri, 21 Dec 2018 at 10:00 AM Rock n Concepts proudly presents the Outlaws & Renegades Tour featuring Travis Tritt, Charlie Daniels Band and Cadillac 3 at The Raising Cane’s River Center on Sunday, June 30th! Don’t miss this epic event with these LIVING LEGENDS as they bring the classics all evening! 1564549200 Arts & Theatre Bring It Live! Vip Upsell Raising Canes River Center July 31, 2019 July 31, 2019 5:00 PM 8:00 PM Enhance your Bring It! LIVE experience with a pre-show photo opportunity with Miss D & the Dancing Dolls plus anofficial 2019 Bring It! Live Tour souvenir program. Purchase of a regular ticket required for use. The VIP photo opportunity will take place two and a half hours prior to show time. Sale Dates and Times: Public Onsale : Wed, 9 Jan 2019 at 10:00 AM 1564549200 Arts & Theatre Bring It! Live Raising Canes River Center July 31, 2019 July 31, 2019 7:30 PM 10:00 PM Sale Dates and Times: Public Onsale : Fri, 11 Jan 2019 at 10:00 AM 1566882000 Family Events WWE Smackdown Live Raising Canes River Center August 27, 2019 August 27, 2019 6:45 PM 12:00 AM WWE SmackDown returns to Raising Cane’s River Center with the return of the legendary King of the Ring Tournament! Don’t miss this Double Main Event! See The New Day vs. Randy Orton with Daniel Bryan and Rowan! Also Roman Reigns takes on Samoa Joe! Plus Women's Champion Bayley! Plus Charlotte Flair Drew McIntyre And many more! $100, $95, $65, $50, $40, $30 AND $20* AVAILABLE AT TICKETMASTER.COM AND THE VENUE BOX OFFICE. *Additional Fees May Apply / Talent Subject to Change* 1568869200 Family Events Garden Brothers Circus Raising Canes River Center September 19, 2019 September 19, 2019 4:30 PM 12:00 AM The Most Epic Show on Earth! The All New 2019 Edition of GARDEN BROS CIRCUS is Coming! This year's show is packed with breathtaking special effects, concert style sound and lighting and 3 RINGS bursting with excitement, laughter and memories that families will always cherish. The very best performers from over 22 countries make up this action jammed, fast paced 100 minute performance in a Theatrical European 3 RING setting. FEATURING The Largest Elephant on Earth! Chinese Acrobats, Daring Aerial Artists, 6 Motorcycles in the Sphere of Fear, Racing camels performing with the largest and smallest horses in the world, Contortionists, the funniest Clowns, Jugglers as seen on America's Got Talent, not enough room to list anymore!!! KIDS FUN ZONE: ride an elephant, a camel, a circus pony, a giant slide, or a bouncy house and the whole family can get their face painted like Spiderman. Come hungry cause there's plenty of food! First 100 Adult Tickets sold online are $12.50 at www.GardenBrosCircus.com. *Applicable fees may apply "We've made it a real affordable family event with the cooperation of participating retail outlets" said Niles Garden, producer of Garden Brothers Circus. In the words of Walt Disney "I want families to have as much fun as they do at the circus." Tickets can be purchased at www.GardenBrosCircus.com, Ticketmaster.com, and at the Raising Cane's River Center Box Office. Sale Dates and Times: Public Onsale : Fri, 26 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM Theresa Caputo Fan Club EXCLUSIVE PRESAL : Tue, 23 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM Venue Presale : Thu, 25 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM Artist FB Presale : Thu, 25 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM 1573538400 Family Events Five Finger Death Punch Raising Canes River Center November 12, 2019 November 12, 2019 6:30 PM 8:00 PM Sale Dates and Times: Public Onsale : Fri, 26 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM Live Nation Mobile App Presale : Thu, 25 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM Live Nation Presale : Thu, 25 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM Citi® Cardmember Presale : Wed, 24 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM Citi® Cardmember Preferred Tickets : Fri, 26 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM Official Platinum Presale : Tue, 23 Jul 2019 at 11:00 AM Official Platinum Onsale : Fri, 26 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM Venue Presale : Thu, 25 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM FFDP VIP Packages Presale : Tue, 23 Jul 2019 at 11:00 AM FFDP VIP Packages Public Onsale : Fri, 26 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM Fan Presale : Tue, 23 Jul 2019 at 11:00 AM Three Days Grace Presale : Wed, 24 Jul 2019 at 10:00 AM 1574402400 Live Music The Prophecy: The Music of Trans-Siberian Orchestra Raising Canes River Center November 22, 2019 November 22, 2019 7:30 PM 9:30 PM ON SALE NOW! Launching it’s 13th touring season of an extravagant Christmas musical production! This powerhouse group of classically trained musicians come together to create nothing short of an electrifying evening of holiday rock music. Performing in the style of Trans-Siberian Orchestra, The Prophecy has spared no details when it comes to costumes, choreography, music,lasers and fog. With more than 10 million albums sold, the original Trans-Siberian Orchestra has inspired generations of fans to rediscover the multi-dimensional art form of the rock opera. Meanwhile, on the road, they have become one of the world’s top acts, with Billboard magazine naming TSO as one of the top touring artists of the past decade. The Prophecy Show delivers all of the flash, flair, and musical magic to some of the more intimate venues across the country. Each of these musicians possess several music degrees and have been hand selected by Producer and Lead Guitarist Thomas Rudebeck, who prides himself on giving the audience the best possible production and sound available. Audiences everywhere are celebrating over 20 years of the most famous holiday rock music ever created with the TSO rock opera that is legendary. Come experience the power, the music and the magic once again this Christmas season at The Raising Cane’s River Center arena, as the Prophecy performs all of your favorite music from the Trans-Siberian Orchestra and more! 1575352800 Arts & Theatre Sesame Street Live! Let's Party! Raising Canes River Center December 3, 2019 December 3, 2019 6:00 PM 8:00 PM Jump to the beat with your friends on Sesame Street! Introducing an all-new, interactive show that unfolds on one of the worlds most famous streets at the funniest, furriest party in the neighborhood... get ready for Sesame Street Live! Lets Party! The last few years, the 85 South Show has been shaking up the podcasting scene with improvs and freestyles by some of the fastest rising comedic talent from the South. Join DC Young Fly, Karlous Miller and Chico Bean on December 6 as they bring their talents to Baton Rouge. Its going to be one hell of a show... and the whole thing will be turned into a new episode for the masses. Sale Dates and Times: Public Onsale : Fri, 20 Sep 2019 at 10:00 AM 1576303200 Live Music 69th Annual Cortana Kiwanis Christmas Parade Raising Canes River Center December 14, 2019 December 14, 2019 4:00 PM 8:00 PM Give Santa Claus ???? a warm welcome as he rides in on the Coca-Cola Express in the 69th Annual Cortana Kiwanis Christmas Parade. ???? This year’s parade is hosted by Liz Koh WAFB and Jay Grymes WAFB of WAFB Channel 9 and led by Grand Marshals Jay Ducote, Healthy Blue CEO Aaron Lambert and Snow Queen & Ice Princess. The parade is free! But if you're interested in purchasing a VIP ticket for $25 you can get - Premium seating in front of the River Center and front row for Battle of the Bands - A plate of jambalaya and a coke product - Specialty beads and exclusive throws from each float To purchase this special experience visit: https://www.christmasinbr.com/vip-bleacher-seats-with-discount-co The 2019 Battle of the Bands begins at 4:00 p.m. in front of the Raising Cane’s River Center. With the parade rolling at 5:30. Jambalaya will be available for purchase during the event. Come cheer on your favorite bands, including: - Baker High School - Baker Middle School - Capitol Middle Magnet School - Istrouma High School - McKinley Senior High School Band - Park Forest Middle Marching Band - Plaquemine High Marching Band Proceeds benefit local charities such as: Our Lady of the Lake Children's Health The Children's Miracle Network Radiothon Milton J. Womack Golf Tournament benefiting OLOL Children's Hospital Distribution of Thanksgiving and Christmas Food Baskets Trauma Dolls to OLOL Hospital and BR Fire Department Defibrillators for Local Schools B.U.G. (Bring Up Grades) in Elementary Schools The Mayor's Celebrity Bowling Challenge benefiting the Greater Baton Rouge Food Bank Big Buddy Christmas Shopping Spree Kiwanis International's "The Eliminate Project" - Eliminating maternal/neonatal tetanus worldwide For sponsorship information visit www.ChristmasInBR.com 1576303200 Family Events "The Nutcracker - A Tale from the Bayou" Raising Canes River Center December 14, 2019 December 14, 2019 2:00 PM 3:45 PM The magic returns to the Raising Cane's River Center Arena as you are transported to the beautiful holiday worlds of magic, mice, snow and sweets at "The Nutcracker - A Tale from the Bayou". With lush costumes, stirring choreography, beautiful local dancers, and international guest artists accompanied by the Baton Rouge Symphony Orchestra, you'll experience what the Advocate has called "the crown jewel of the Baton Rouge holiday season"! 1576389600 Arts & Theatre The Nutcracker: A Tale From The Bayou Raising Canes River Center December 15, 2019 December 15, 2019 2:00 PM 4:00 PM Baton Rouge Ballet Theatres holiday classic returns to its new realm on the stage of the Raising Canes River Center Arena. Bringing together internationally acclaimed guest artists, local children, professional and pre-professional performers, and the Baton Rouge Symphony Orchestra, The Nutcracker, A Tale from the Bayou, is sure to delight audiences with its lavish choreography and costumes and creative new twists. Sale Dates and Times: Public Onsale : Thu, 1 Aug 2019 at 10:00 AM 1576821600 Family Events Skating On the River Raising Canes River Center December 20, 2019 December 20, 2019 10:00 AM 10:00 PM Each skater needs a ticket. Those patrons coming to watch but not skate do not need a ticket. SKATE AT YOUR OWN RISK. Skating begins December 20th and runs through January 5th. Skating will be closed on Christmas Day and New Years Day. Each ticket is for a specific date and session. Session times are 10am, 12pm, 2pm, 4pm, 6pm and 8pm. On Christmas Eve and New Years Eve there will only be sessions at 10am, 12pm and 2pm. Each session has a limited number of tickets available and sessions can and do sell out. Please get your tickets early! Online purchases will be will call only so you will need to pick up physical tickets at the box office prior to entering the arena. For any questions please call the Raising Canes River Center at 225 389-3030 or 225 389-4940. Michelangelo Exhibition displaying reproductions of the Sistine Chapel A Different View presents a very different perspective of Michelangelo's works. Where you have to look up in the Sistine chapel, in the exhibition the masterpieces are on ground level so that visitors can walk around the gigantic masterpieces, giving a unique different view of Michelangelo's masterpieces. Michelangelo Exhibition displaying reproductions of the Sistine Chapel A Different View presents a very different perspective of Michelangelo's works. The exhibition shows photomechanically reproduced copies of the frescoes from the Sistine Chapel almost in original size. Where you have to look up in the Sistine chapel, in the exhibition the masterpieces are on ground level so that visitors can walk around the gigantic masterpieces, giving a unique different view of Michelangelo's masterpieces.
